The claim states that 92: year-old Pam Nelson of Victoria, Texas was unable to vote due to new laws requiring voters to present ID.
The Facebook page: Occupy Democrats" published an image meme with this claim, but did not provide any additional information or sources to verify the authenticity of the claim.
Upon investigation: no articles or information about "Pam Nelson" or her inability to vote could be found, and no one by that name was located in or near Victoria, Texas.
Occupy Democrats: later clarified that the woman in the meme was not named Pam Nelson, but rather Bernice, and that Pam Nelson was her granddaughter's name.
